ReportItem.pluginName: Apache Tomcat AJP File Read Vulnerability (Ghostcat)
ReportItem.plugin_name: Apache Tomcat AJP File Read Vulnerability (Ghostcat)
ReportItem.description: Tomcat AJP file inclusion / arbitrary file read (Ghostcat).
ReportItem.solution: Upgrade Tomcat or disable AJP connector.

ReportItem.pluginName: Microsoft IIS WebDAV ScStoragePathFromUrl Buffer Overflow (CVE-2017-7269)
ReportItem.plugin_name: Microsoft IIS WebDAV ScStoragePathFromUrl Buffer Overflow (CVE-2017-7269)
ReportItem.description: Buffer overflow in IIS WebDAV ScStoragePathFromUrl.

ReportItem.pluginName: MS17-010: Security Update for Microsoft Windows SMB Server (4013389)
ReportItem.plugin_name: MS17-010: Security Update for Microsoft Windows SMB Server (4013389)
ReportItem.description: Remote code execution in SMBv1 (EternalBlue).
Apache HTTP Server vulnerable to path traversal and file disclosure.
ReportItem.solution: Upgrade Apache HTTPD to a fixed version.

ReportItem.description: OpenSSL SM2 decryption buffer overflow.
SSH allows legacy ciphers / MACs.
RDP configured with weak security layer / legacy protocols.
System runs an outdated OpenSSH version with known issues.
Server may allow NULL sessions which can leak info.
Informational plugin describing the scan.
